name: Beanie & The Devil's Die
description:
Beanie & The Devil's Die

Play as Beanie, a blue bean-like character who makes a deal with a red horned man for a very special die. 

The details of the deal did not interest Beanie. Beanie just wanted that die; and now, Beanie must traverse NINE, SEVEN, three levels!

(Didn't really have the time to realize the whole game)

How To Play

Half of the game is a platformer, you already know how to play that. 

You press the A and D keys to move around. And space to jump!

The other half is a little more difficult. But it all boils down to one thing:
Roll some dice, and drag them to the Die Slots to mod an attribute of how the level will be played. You can increase your jump height, movement speed, and health, while also being able to change the amount of hazards that may spawn, the potency of those hazards, and keeping the level timer high!

Once you're satisfied, press the "Proceed" button.
